DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare a fish oil containing lipid emulsion against a medium-chain/long-chain triglyceride (MCT/LCT) lipid emulsion in terms of their efficacy and safety during postoperative parenteral nutrition.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of a Fish Oil Containing Lipid Emulsion
